revised_title: Determining Specific Gravities and Attractive Powers of Saline Substances
tldr: The author, Richard Kirwan, conducted experiments to determine the specific gravities and attractive powers of various saline substances. He developed methods to measure the specific gravity of compounds and acids, and discovered that the increase in density of compounds is due to the attraction or affinity between their components. This research contributed to the understanding of chemical affinities and the properties of acids and salts.
